places.name: Mountain View Museum
places.description: Discover the rich history of the valley through interactive exhibits.

places.name: Barton Creek Greenbelt
places.address: 3755-B S Capital of Texas Hwy, Austin, TX 78704
places.description: A beautiful park with hiking trails, swimming holes, and rock climbing areas. Great for outdoor lovers!

places.name: Sunset Valley Nature Area
places.description: A peaceful nature preserve with walking trails and wildlife viewing.

places.name: South Congress Avenue (SoCo)
places.description: A lively district filled with shops, restaurants, and live music.

places.name: Zilker Botanical Garden
places.description: Stunning themed gardens featuring native plants, streams, and koi ponds.

places.name: Lady Bird Johnson Wildflower Center
places.description: A gorgeous conservation garden featuring native Texas plants and wildlife.

places.name: The Veloway
places.description: A 3-mile paved loop exclusively for bicyclists and rollerbladers.

places.name: Sunset Valley Farmers Market
places.description: Fresh, local produce and artisan goods every Saturday morning.
